parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>The post contains a CMF number (13240004).  This strongly suggests electoral propaganda, as CMF numbers are used for tracking campaign spending and are mandated for political advertising in Romania.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>The post mentions "Demeter András István," who is a candidate for the UDMR party. The hashtags #echipapentruilfovdeputați and #echipapentruilfovsenat clearly refer to the parliamentary elections in Ilfov County.  This fulfills "Article 36 (7) - a".</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>This is a paid Facebook post, targeting a wide audience. The reach estimate is ">1M," indicating a broad dissemination intended to reach many people. This satisfies "Article 36 (7) - c".</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>The hashtags and the mention of the candidate strongly suggest the objective is to promote Demeter András István's candidacy in the parliamentary elections. The phrase "Alege Vocea Rațiunii" ("Choose the Voice of Reason") is a clear call to action, urging voters to support the candidate. This fulfills "Article 36 (7) - c".</electoral-objective>
<journalism>The content is not journalistic in nature. It lacks objective reporting and instead focuses on promoting a specific candidate. The statement "Cetățeanul nu este poștaș, curier sau copiator de acte" ("The citizen is not a postman, courier, or document copier") appears to be a slogan rather than factual information.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>The post does not express a personal opinion; it's a clear campaign advertisement.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>865550199077924</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The post strongly indicates electoral propaganda.  The presence of a CMF number, explicit mention of a candidate running in the parliamentary elections, targeted hashtags promoting the candidate, and a clear call to action ("Alege Vocea Rațiunii") all point towards an attempt to influence voters. The post's reach is substantial, further supporting this conclusion. While the statement "Cetățeanul nu este poștaș, curier sau copiator de acte" could be interpreted as a general statement, within the context of the rest of the post, it functions as a slogan supporting the candidate.  There are no counterarguments to suggest this is not electoral propaganda.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate><name>Demeter András István</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>UDMR</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
RMDSZ/UDMR, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea, după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, a unei postări pe Facebook (ID 865550199077924) cu conținut electoral, ce promovează candidatura lui Demeter András István pentru alegerile parlamentare din Ilfov, folosind hashtag-uri precum #echipapentruilfovdeputați și #echipapentruilfovsenat, precum și sloganul „Alege Vocea Rațiunii”, având un efect electoral clar prin încercarea de a influența votul alegătorilor în favoarea candidatului menționat. Prezența numărului CMF 13240004 confirmă natura electorală a postării.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
